name: Prowler Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a piece of Crawler Armor ( #L "see here" "/tell recipe 37" ) #L "Damaged Proliferation Unit" "245215" #L "Screwdriver" "150922" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Screwdriver + Damaged Proliferation Unit = #L "Proliferation Unit" "245216" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Proliferation Unit + a piece of Crawler Armor = a piece of Prowler Armor Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Prowler Armor Sleeves" "245176" #L "Prowler Body Armor" "245178" #L "Prowler Armor Gloves" "245180" #L "Prowler Armor Pants" "245182" #L "Prowler Armor Boots" "245184" #L "Prowler Armor Shoulder Pad" "245186" #L "Prowler Armor Hood" "245188" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Great armor if you can get 7 DPUs.. this can often prove a difficult task though, as they are well camped.
